category.name: Impact Wrenches
category.path: Pneumatics\Impact Wrenches

category_idosell.path: Pneumatics\Impact Wrenches

description.name: Air Impact Wrench 1/2" with Sockets Set
description.long_desc:
1/2 in. Air Impact Wrench with socket and accessory set.


Product Features



  • Maximum torque 850 Nm

  • Rotation direction switch

  • The set is packed in a practical plastic case

  • Includes Sockets and an Oiler


Technical Data



  • Maximum Impact Torque: 850 Nm

  • Max Speed: 7000 rpm

  • Working Pressure: 6.2 bar

  • Average Air Consumption: 228 l/min

  • Socket Drive Size: 1/2"

  • Air Connection Size: 1/4"


Package Content



  • Sockets 1/2 inch Drive 6-point Cr-V: 9, 10, 11, 13, 14, 17, 19, 22, 24, 27 mm

  • 1/2" 125mm extension

  • Oil container

  • Allen wrench

  • Air quick coupler 1/4"

  • Oiler 1/4"

category.name: Oil and Oil-free Compressors
category.path: Pneumatics\Oil and Oil-free Compressors

category_idosell.path: Pneumatics\Oil and Oil-free Compressors

description.name: Air oil compressor 100L Compact
description.long_desc:
Kompresor olejowy 2-tłokowy o pojemności 100L wykonany z wysokiej jakości podzespołów. Wyposażony został w silnik elektryczny o mocy 4,1 KM oraz 2-tłokową pompę smarowaną olejem, która idealnie nadaje się do długotrwałej pracy. Kompresor posiada reduktor ciśnienia wyposażony w innowacyjny mechanizm regulacji, separator oraz duży manometr usytuowany na kompresorze w pozycji ułatwiającej odczyt parametrów.

Cechy produktu:

  • wyposażony w prosty w budowie, przez co mało awaryjny agregat 2-cylindrowy smarowany olejem
  • mobilny - posiada kółka, dzięki czemu bardzo łatwo się z nim przemieszcza
  • wysoka wydajność przy jednocześnie niskim poborze energii
  • posiada reduktor ciśnienia wyposażony w innowacyjny mechanizm regulacji, duży manometr usytuowany na kompresorze w pozycji ułatwiającej odczyt parametrów
  • idealny do stosowania z większością urządzeń pneumatycznych
  • kompresor zalany olejem, gotowy do pracy
  • wyposażony w separator oleju z reduktorem ciśnienia, który zatrzymuje w wydmuchiwanym powietrzu wodę i olej

Dane techniczne:

  • Silnik: elektryczny, chłodzony powietrzem
  • Rodzaj pompy: 2-tłokowa, smarowana olejem
  • Ciśnienie maksymalne: 9 BAR
  • Ciśnienie robocze: 8 BAR
  • Moc silnika: 4,1 KM
  • Zasilanie: 230 V
  • Pojemność zbiornika: 100 L
  • Wydajność na wejściu: 530 l/min
  • Wydajność efektywna: 380 l/min

category.name: Impact Sockets and Accessories

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Socket Wrenches and Accessories\Impact Sockets and Accessories

description.name: Alloy Rim Impact Sockets Set 17mm 19mm 21mm 22mm (4pcs)
description.long_desc:
Professional Alloy Rim impact socket set. The set includes the following sizes: 17, 19, 21 and 22 mm. These sockets are made of chrome-molybdenum steel to remain sturdy, rust-resistant and last for years. Each socket has plastic sleeve for the damage-free work on aluminium rims .


Product Features



  • Sockets sizes included in the set: 17, 19, 21, 22 mm

  • Extremely durable Cr-Mo steel

  • 1/2" square drive

  • Socket length - 78 mm

  • Plastic sleeves for the damage-free work on aluminium rims, it protects the surfaces at the wheel screws & nuts
  • In durable plastic storage case

category.name: Riveters
category.path: Joining Tools\Riveters

category_idosell.path: Joining Tools\Riveters

description.name: Professional riveter M3-M10 GEKO PREMIUM (SET)
description.long_desc:
Lever riveter designed for making connections of various types of materials with the use of rivet nuts. The riveter is made of the highest quality materials. Equipped with a set of five heads in sizes: M3, M4, M5, M6, M8, M10. The use of rivet nuts allows you to screw additional elements with a screw in the size of a rivet nut.


Riveter heads are made of high-quality chrome-molybdenum steel. Handles finished with profiled, rubber grips for maximum comfort of work.


Product Characteristics:
high quality
set of 6 heads in sizes: M3, M4, M5, M6, M8, M10
heads made of high-quality chrome-molybdenum steel
set of rivet nuts M3, M4, M5, M6, M8, M10 included (10 pieces of each size)
all packed in a handy plastic suitcase


Technical Specifications:
Manufacturer: GEKO
Length: 330mm
Thread pitch: 8mm
Rivet nut head sizes: M3, M4, M5, M6, M8, M10
Head material: chrome-molybdenum steel


Kit Contents:
riveting machine for rivet nuts
set of heads: M3, M4, M5, M6, M8, M10
set of steel rivet nuts: M3(10pcs.), M4(10pcs.), M5(10pcs.), M6(10pcs.), M8(10pcs.), M10(10pcs.)
service key

description.name: Portable power jack 10T
description.long_desc:
10T Porta Power Jack Set. Ideal for a variety of auto body, frame repair, and construction jobs.


Technical Data



  • Operating Capacity: 10 Tons

  • Working Pressure: 63 MPa

  • Ram Stroke: 130 mm


Contents:



  • Hydraulic Pump

  • Hydraulic Ram 10 Tone

  • Flexible Hose

  • Spreader

  • Extension tubes: 5", 10", 14", 19"

  • 3pc Male Connectors

  • 90° V Base

  • Wedge Head

  • Flat Base

  • Flange Base

  • Flange Head

  • Rubber Head

  • Cap Head

category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage

description.name: Floor Jack 4T low profile Two piston 44kg
description.long_desc:
Robust and stable Hydraulic Trolley Jack 4T GEKO Premium. Dual pump for quick lift.


Product Features



  • 4 tonne lifting capacity

  • Huge 550 mm lifting height

  • Dual pump for quick lift

  • Twist grip handle release mechanism for controlled lowering

  • Two swivel castors to enable easy positioning

  • Two large steel wheels for better stability


Technical Data



  • Loading Capacity: 4 tonne

  • Minimum Height: 95 mm

  • Maximum Height: 550 mm

  • Saddle Size: 110 x 110 mm

  • Wheels Size: 85 x 50 mm / 60 x 24 mm

  • Weight: approx. 44 kg

  • Dimensions [L x W]: 745 x 360 mm


Package Contents:



  • 1x Hydraulic trolley 4T

  • 1x Handle 125 cm

description.name: Motorcycle transportation stand
description.long_desc:
Stojak motocyklowy przeznaczony do bezpiecznego transportowania motocykli.

Przystosowany do montażu do podłogi przyczepy, busa, platformy oraz posadzki garażowej itp. Przeznaczony do motocykli o wymiarach kół 14-22".

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • wysoka jakość wykonania
  • przeznaczony pod przednie koło motocykla o wymiarach 14-22"
  • przystosowany do montażu do podłogi przyczepy, busa, platformy oraz posadzki garażowej itp.
  • zapewnia bezpieczny transport motocykla

description.name: Pipe wrench 1/2" GEKO PREMIUM
description.long_desc:
S Shape Pipe Wrench 1/2", angled at 45°.



  • Double-T profile grip with captive adjusting nut

  • Induction-hardened teeth offset against direction of rotation

description.name: 20T Porta Power Jack
description.long_desc:
20T Porta Power Jack Set. Ideal for a variety of auto body, frame repair, and construction jobs.


Technical Data



  • Operating Capacity: 20 Tons

  • Operating Range: 330 - 460 mm

  • Ram Stroke: 130 mm


Contents:



  • Hydraulic Pump

  • Hydraulic Ram 20 Tone

  • Flexible Hose

  • Extension tubes: 10 (5"), 20 (8"), 30 (12"), 50 cm (20")

  • 3pc Male Connectors

  • 90° V Base

  • Wedge Head

  • Flat Base

  • Metal Case 71x30x15 cm

20T Porta Power Jack Set. Ideal for a variety of auto body, frame repair, and construction jobs.

category.name: Analog
category.path: Measuring Tools\Vernier and Electronic Calipers\Analog

category_idosell.path: Measuring Tools\Vernier and Electronic Calipers\Analog

description.name: Heavy Duty Vernier Caliper 600mm 0,05mm
description.long_desc:
The Vernier Caliper is a precision instrument that can be used to measure internal distances accurately. The vernier caliper has a scale sliding parallel to the main scale for an additional, fractional reading to improve measurement precision.


Product Features



  • Internal jaws to make inside dimension measurements

  • Metric scale

  • Locking screw to ensure precision


Technical Data



  • Material: Stainless Steel

  • Surface Finish: Satin

  • Features: Knurled locking screw, vernier scale, retainer

  • Range: 600 mm

  • Resolution: 0.05 mm

  • Overall Length: 740 mm
description.short_desc:

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Service Equipment\Assembly Aids

description.name: Low profile Engine Shop Crane 1T PREMIUM
description.long_desc:
1T Low profile hydraulic Shop Crane. Low profile design to get under low cars - 85 mm.


Product Features



  • Capacity up to 1000kg / 1 Ton

  • Maximum hook height up to 2200 mm

  • Hydraulic pump with swivel handle to easily raise boom

  • Hand adjustated release valve to lower boom

  • Boom end includes a swivel hook for lifting

  • Wide base for maximum stability

  • Foldable legs

  • Two heavy-duty casters and two swivel casters


Technical Data



  • Legs spacing [inner/outer]: 84 / 100 cm

  • Legs length: 146 cm

  • Height: 146 cm

  • Telescopic boom length: from 105 to 129 cm

  • Base height: 8,5 cm

  • Max Height: 220 cm
